amendment.description: To require persons located in flood prone areas to hold flood insurance as a condition for receiving federal disaster assistance.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 4716 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 4716 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 4707. (consideration: CR S3947-3948; text: CR S3947) To require persons located in flood prone areas to hold flood insurance as a condition for receiving federal disaster assistance.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4716 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 4707.
